name: PopHead
description:
Nevada, 2044. Very strange reports were recieved from Rochester, a town placed nearby old military base. You are an secret agent send to find out what's going on.

PopHead is a 2D RPG game that is being developed by an amateur group SPC. This is a first demo release that reveals basic game mechanics and game plot. If you want to follow our progress, or to join our team, follow the project site and join our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/3e3KnVK

The game is being made on our custom game engine. It's an open source project; You can see the source code here:
https://github.com/SPC-Some-Polish-Coders/PopHead/

Controls:
moving: AWSD
shooting: Enter
hitting: backslash
